```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
```

# Preparation
```{r echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
gf <- params$gems_factor
library(tidyverse)
load("all_individual_anovas.Rda")
```

# Assumptions
## Outliers
```{r boxplots}
all_individual_anovas[[gf]]$boxplots
```
```{r outliers}
all_individual_anovas[[gf]]$outliers %>%
    knitr::kable()
```

## Normality: QQ Plots and Shapiro-Wilk Test
```{r qqplots}
all_individual_anovas[[gf]]$normality_qqplots
```
```{r shapiro-wilk}
all_individual_anovas[[gf]]$normality_test %>%
    knitr::kable()
```

## Sphericity
```{r sphericity}
all_individual_anovas[[gf]]$sphericity %>%
    knitr::kable()
```

# Results
```{r results}
all_individual_anovas[[gf]]$results %>%
    knitr::kable()
```
